outputs.output_descr: The main goal of HIV project is to achieve universal access to HIV services as well as prevention, treatment, care and support that enables people living with HIV to live fulfilling life.
donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS

document_name: Project Document "Strengthening the supportive environment and scaling up prevention, treatment and care to contain HIV epidemic in the Republic of Tajikistan"
Community systems strengthening aimed at removing legal barriers to access HIV prevention and treatment services in the Republic of Tajikistan
Community systems strengthening aimed at removing legal barriers to access HIV prevention and treatment services in the Republic of Tajikistan (108-2016-RFP-UNDP-GF-HIV/AIDS)

Multidisciplinary approach to improve adherence of PLHIV to ART and TB among new, continuing and lost to follow up patients (241-2016-RFP-UNDP-GF-HIV/AIDS), deadline is extended till 14.12.2016, 12:00

Provision of clearing, storage, transportation and distribution services of goods including special controlled substances purchased under the United Nations Development Programme in Tajikistan on Long Term basis (154-2016-ITB-UNDP-GF-HIV/AIDS-@)
Technical Assistance for the implementation of External Quality Assurance Systems for the Republican AIDS Center HIV/AIDS Laboratory network (39-2016-RFP-UNDP-GF-HIV/AIDS-@_extension)
project_title: prevention, treatment and care to contain hiv epidemic in tajikistan
